meanings.definition: In relation to the structure of an organism's body.
meanings.sent1: The anatomically correct model helped students learn about the human body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the anatomically significant features of the heart.
meanings.sent3: The artist's anatomically precise drawing of a frog made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of the human body was so anatomically detailed, it was like she had x-ray vision.
meanings.sent5: The surgeon's hands moved with an anatomically precise grace during the operation.

meanings.definition: In a way that pertains to the physical structure of living things.
meanings.sent1: She examined the specimen anatomically to understand its structure better.
meanings.sent2: The biologist observed the cells under the microscope anatomically.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched anatomically after waking up from its nap.
meanings.sent4: The tree branches intertwined anatomically, creating a natural canopy.
meanings.sent5: The robot moved anatomically, mimicking human-like motions.
